title: Xbox 20th Anniversary Celebration Live Reactions
description:
Tim, Andy, Blessing, and Mike react to the fantastic Xbox retrospective.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell: 
Kinda Funny: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Games: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Plays: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnyplays?sub_confirmation=1

Kinda Funny Games http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunnyGames

transcript_chunks.text: what's up and welcome back to another kind of funny games live reaction this time too the 20th anniversary celebration for xbox i can't believe it i wonder if the rest of the cast that i am with can that cast includes the natural rifle andy cortez good morning the new face of video games blessing eddie oh yeah junior i can't believe it and the host of the kind of funny x-cast the master of hype snow bike mike tim it's monday morning and it's a gosh darn celebration of awesome 20 years of xbox and i'm pretty pumped up about this anniversary stream just to celebrate and look back on all the memories i hold so fondly yeah man i think this is a it's a really cool thing we saw a lot of celebrations obviously with nintendo over the years they're always celebrating some milestone and then playstation a couple years back celebrating its 20th year anniversary kind of really cemented playstation as as a brand in a different way like there's there's lore there's legacy to it all and to see xbox

a couple years back celebrating its 20th year anniversary kind of really cemented playstation as as a brand in a different way like there's there's lore there's legacy to it all and to see xbox have that moment too is like it's crazy man like it's been a a wild 20 years multiple console generations so many hit titles uh and of course the master chief himself all the rumors of will they drop the halo multiplayer today let's go around before we go live do you think it's happening andy cortez no do you think it's happening blessing yes do you think it's happening mike i don't think it's happening i think it's happening oh my gosh i want to believe i want to believe just just for the pure hype of it i think it would be the coolest decision ever to be like yo it's time let's just drop it let people play it for like a week or two or even like i'm going through the campaign releases i'm going the opposite way it's not dropping and they're delaying it for two years 2023 bro get ready so if

people play it for like a week or two or even like i'm going through the campaign releases i'm going the opposite way it's not dropping and they're delaying it for two years 2023 bro get ready so if anything does happen the excitement is all there oh my gosh i'm just so excited because most importantly i love being around you guys and when i think of xbox i think about being online and being a part of a community playing games together and that is what halo is to me and so if it does drop today that's awesome right we all get to get wild and crazy we got to go play some custom games hopefully some 12 v12s but i think back of halo 1 on the og xbox all of us screen cheating and looking at each other's screens to halo 2 being on xbox live like that's what it's all about to me so i'm really pumped up to celebrate that and think about those moments playing against my brother and then setting up a poster board and cutting the tv in half and i would stand on the bed and look above the tv and

up to celebrate that and think about those moments playing against my brother and then setting up a poster board and cutting the tv in half and i would stand on the bed and look above the tv and he'd be sitting on the floor looking underneath and it's so funny that we all have these like shared memories of this thing and it's like the xbox was really kind of console gaming's introduction to a lot of that like halo was the first first-person shooter of consequence that wasn't goldeneye on consoles right and like i'll never forget me and all my friends for my friend current's birthday taking all of our xboxes lugging them up this giant hill these dumbass like 12 year old kids with way too many controllers and way too many things and playing like eight v8 capture the flag in this house as many xboxes connected with cables all over the place like oh man what a what a disaster from that to gears of war with 2000 whatever year it was when cliffy b came out with that insane commercial that

xboxes connected with cables all over the place like oh man what a what a disaster from that to gears of war with 2000 whatever year it was when cliffy b came out with that insane commercial that played all the time and people just losing their mind for gears of war and everything that we've come from since especially we even got to look at the bads an xbox one announcement at e3 was unbelievable oh man i'll never forget it man and then we forget it we we rewrote the ship here and it's looking good moving forward which is great while we're here i my one hope is for some jet site radio feature bring it back oh love all the logos i think we're to get some pretty cool callbacks i hope we get a lot more like backwards compatible stuff let's go baby this feels like an early 2000s like the h oh man look at how hyped this is right bless going through all the generations right now our passion is to help you find out they're just like oh let's get back you know i love the art form of video

oh man look at how hyped this is right bless going through all the generations right now our passion is to help you find out they're just like oh let's get back you know i love the art form of video games i think we tell stories that bring people together whether it's competing or whether it's cooperative this is just what gaming should be about it still blows my mind that but does this xbox down yep wild look at all this hype look at this video this is dope that's hot got the chills oh my god this is how it sounded bro this is what it was oh man i had so many cds loaded on my og xbox dude oh my god look at this with xbox fans around the world i mean just look at this stage that alone shows you how far we've all come since 2001 my name is and i had the privilege of being in charge of xbox until i retired from microsoft in 2010 when we started xbox 20 years ago the original idea was a business venture a way for microsoft to get into the living room but as we assembled our team and got

until i retired from microsoft in 2010 when we started xbox 20 years ago the original idea was a business venture a way for microsoft to get into the living room but as we assembled our team and got to work xbox quickly blossomed into a new vision for what games could be an ethernet port to connect players over the internet at broadband speeds yeah a built-in hard drive to help games evolve beyond the limitations of disks and cartridges a global dedicated online service to let you play with old and new friends alike no matter where they are these were audacious groundbreaking ideas at the time good word but they were all so risky we faced skeptics and doubters i'll be honest and say inside and outside of microsoft we had missteps along the way there were lots of challenges involved in getting that first xbox out the door in a way that was true to our vision so when i think about what it took to bring xbox to life i always remember that success was not guaranteed and it was your

in getting that first xbox out the door in a way that was true to our vision so when i think about what it took to bring xbox to life i always remember that success was not guaranteed and it was your passion for what xbox is that transformed that vision into reality a vision only comes to life when others share a belief in what's possible and for that we are grateful for all of you our partners developers around the world and most of all our fans video games great great way to start it off homie oh man oh wow okay microsoft is going to make a game console we weren't sure how we were going to do it risk was enormous yeah this is exciting microsoft was this dominant company of the era but success or even survival was anything but pre-ordained we started to ship quality games and at the same time we weren't doing anything in the console space one day these guys from the directx team walked in a lot of our thinking was focused on making the very best games that really meant something for

time we weren't doing anything in the console space one day these guys from the directx team walked in a lot of our thinking was focused on making the very best games that really meant something for us we wanted to make a console design to be easy and fun to make games on we were trying to crash meetings and get traction on this thing we were an annoyance you're proposing taking money away from office in order to fund some game system balmer understood where the money came from steve looked at the xbox idea and saw insanity wait just one minute before you answer what's the hard drive going to cost what's the ethernet port going to cost there's no way everything about making a console is hard we made this little device it was held together by chewing gum and pace and it doesn't turn on and it became clear that there was just some really big challenges for us the duke wasn't a small controller you had to have gorilla hands to work with this thing god remember that thing doesn't matter
